lead_paragraph: Officials confirmed that the Sunland Derby or Sunland Park Oaks races would be canceled as Sunland Park Racetrack recovered from an equine herpes outbreak.

headline.main: Virus Shuts Down Races at Track in New Mexico

snippet: Officials confirmed that the Sunland Derby or Sunland Park Oaks races would be canceled as Sunland Park Racetrack recovered from an equine herpes outbreak.
abstract: Sunland Park Racetrack in Sunland, NM, cancel races due to equine herpes outbreak.
